Eastern Securities: a security company in Kuwait, had a contract with Kuwait National Petroleum Company (KNPC) to provide bomb-sniffing dogs for their oil rigs.
When KNPC canceled the contract with Eas: the company chose euthanasia as the most cost-effective way to deal with the unemployed dogs.
The founder of My Cats And Dogs in Kuwai: Missy Skye, initially posted the images, and they gained wider attention when they were shared on the Instagram page of Kuwait Animal Rescue Unit.
